key_findings: Analyzed 50 CI/CD workflows across the repository
42 workflows are candidates for deprecation or major refactoring

priority_recommendations.title: Update Outdated Dependencies
priority_recommendations.description: 13 workflows use outdated actions or dependencies
affected_workflows: Phase 3 CI Auto-Healing: Security & Build Diagnostics

priority_recommendations.title: Deprecate Unused or Redundant Workflows
priority_recommendations.description: 42 workflows have low business value or are unused

outdated_workflows.justification: Workflow appears outdated or unused (0 recent runs). High technical debt: outdated_dependencies, overly_complex.
recommendations: Strong candidate for deprecation
Archive or remove if no longer needed
If still needed, complete rewrite recommended

appendix.methodology: Automated analysis of GitHub Actions workflows, failure logs, and usage patterns using signature-based failure detection and business value assessment.
data_limitations: GitHub Actions run data not available - analysis based on workflow definitions only
Failure signature analysis not performed - cannot identify specific failure patterns
Analysis limited to workflows in .github/workflows directory
Historical data limited to last 50 runs per workflow
Log analysis may miss certain failure patterns due to log formatting variations
future_recommendations: Implement progressive rollout for workflow changes
